description:
Ooh, Youngest`s erasing the board!  Lemme give you a hand,
you can`t reach this high, right?  If you need help you should just ask!
Huh?  You weren`t done copying it?  D-Don`t blame Youngest!
It`s your fault for taking too long!
Youngest`s up here doing her best!  OW!
She`s mad at me again…Why?!  Why can`t I make friends with her?
Huh?  She looks really relaxed sitting under the desk…that must be her sanctuary.
Okay…
Source: crunchyroll
